001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.core;
002
003import java.util.Random;
004
005// Adapted from Bukkit's Perlin noise gen
006public final class PerlinNoise {
007    private final int[] perm = new int[512];
008    private final double offsetX, offsetY, offsetZ;
009
010    public PerlinNoise(Random random) {
011        offsetX = random.nextDouble() * 256;
012        offsetY = random.nextDouble() * 256;
013        offsetZ = random.nextDouble() * 256;
014
015        for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
016            perm[i] = random.nextInt(256);
017        }
018
019        for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
020            int pos = random.nextInt(256 - i) + i;
021            int old = perm[i];
022
023            perm[i] = perm[pos];
024            perm[pos] = old;
025            perm[i + 256] = perm[i];
026        }
027    }
028
029    public double get(double x, double y, double z) {
030        x += offsetX;
031        y += offsetY;
032        z += offsetZ;
033
034        int floorX = floor(x);
035        int floorY = floor(y);
036        int floorZ = floor(z);
037
038        // Find unit cube containing the point
039        int X = floorX & 255;
040        int Y = floorY & 255;
041        int Z = floorZ & 255;
042
043        // Get relative xyz coordinates of the point within the cube
044        x -= floorX;
045        y -= floorY;
046        z -= floorZ;
047
048        // Compute fade curves for xyz
049        double fX = fade(x);
050        double fY = fade(y);
051        double fZ = fade(z);
052
053        // Hash coordinates of the cube corners
054        int A = perm[X] + Y;
055        int AA = perm[A] + Z;
056        int AB = perm[A + 1] + Z;
057        int B = perm[X + 1] + Y;
058        int BA = perm[B] + Z;
059        int BB = perm[B + 1] + Z;
060
061        return lerp(fZ, lerp(fY, lerp(fX, grad(perm[AA], x, y, z),
062                        grad(perm[BA], x - 1, y, z)),
063                    lerp(fX, grad(perm[AB], x, y - 1, z),
064                        grad(perm[BB], x - 1, y - 1, z))),
065                lerp(fY, lerp(fX, grad(perm[AA + 1], x, y, z - 1),
066                        grad(perm[BA + 1], x - 1, y, z - 1)),
067                    lerp(fX, grad(perm[AB + 1], x, y - 1, z - 1),
068                        grad(perm[BB + 1], x - 1, y - 1, z - 1))));
069    }
070
071    // [-1, 1]
072    public double get(double x, double y, double z, int octaves, double lacunarity, double persistence) {
073        double result = 0;
074        double amp = 1;
075        double freq = 1;
076        double max = 0;
077
078        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
079            result += get(x * freq, y * freq, z * freq) * amp;
080            max += amp;
081            freq *= lacunarity;
082            amp *= persistence;
083        }
084
085        return result / max;
086    }
087
088    private static int floor(double x) {
089        return x >= 0 ? (int) x : (int) x - 1;
090    }
091
092    private static double fade(double x) {
093        return x * x * x * (x * (x * 6 - 15) + 10);
094    }
095
096    private static double lerp(double x, double y, double z) {
097        return y + x * (z - y);
098    }
099
100    private static double grad(int hash, double x, double y, double z) {
101        hash &= 15;
102        double u = hash < 8 ? x : y;
103        double v = hash < 4 ? y : hash == 12 || hash == 14 ? x : z;
104        return ((hash & 1) == 0 ? u : -u) + ((hash & 2) == 0 ? v : -v);
105    }
106}
